languages.text: While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.
languages.original_text: При полном запасе {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} солдат получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While at full wounds, the Marksman has +10 Ballistic Skill and +2 MP.
While at full wounds, the Marksman has +10 Ballistic Skill and +2 MP.
While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

languages.text: При полном запасе {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} солдат получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g} и +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}.
languages.original_text: While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: При полном запасе здоровья стрелок получает +10 к Дальнему Бою и +2 ОП.
При полном запасе здоровья стрелок получает +10 к Дальнему Бою и +2 ОП.

languages.text: 士兵满{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与+2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 神射手满{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与+2{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。

languages.text: Mientras tenga sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al máximo, el soldado tiene +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.
languages.original_text: While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras tenga sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al máximo, el tirador de élite tiene +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}.

languages.text: Während er volle {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, verfügt der Soldat über +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g} und +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.
languages.original_text: While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Während er volle {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, verfügt der Scharfschütze über +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est pleine, le Soldat bénéficie d'un bonus de +10 sur sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g} et de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.
languages.original_text: While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est pleine, le Tireur d'Élite bénéficie d'un bonus de +10 sur sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence Balistique{/g} et de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が最大である間、兵士の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}が+10、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+2される。
languages.original_text: While at full {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, the Soldier has +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が最大である間、マークスマンの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}が+10、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が+2される。
